jailbreakpipe.role.attacks package

Submodules

jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.attacker_registry module

jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.attacker_registry.create_attacker(config: BaseAttackerConfig) → BaseAttacker[source]

Create an attacker instance based on the provided configuration.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the attacker. 用于攻击者的配置

Returns:

An instance of the attacker defined by the configuration. 返回配置所定义的攻击者实例

jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.attacker_registry.register_attacker(attacker: type[T]) → type[T][source]

Register an attacker subclass with the ATTACKERS registry.

Parameters:

attacker – Subclass of BaseAttacker to register. 要注册的BaseAttacker子类

Returns:

The registered attacker subclass. 返回注册的攻击者子类

jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.base module

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.base.BaseAttacker(config: BaseAttackerConfig)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract Base Class for Attacker.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the attacker. 攻击者的配置

abstract attack(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], **kwargs) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Abstract method to execute an attack on a sequence of messages.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

  • kwargs – Additional parameters for the attack. 攻击的额外参数

Returns:

Modified list of messages after the attack. 攻击后返回的更改消息列表

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.base.BaseAttackerConfig(attacker_cls: str | None = None, attacker_name: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: ABC

Configuration for the Base Attacker.

Parameters:

  • attacker_cls – Class of the attacker. 攻击者的类型

  • attacker_name – Name of the attacker. 攻击者的名称

attacker_cls: str = None
attacker_name: str = None

jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.rewrite module

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.rewrite.RewriteAttacker(config: RewriteAttackerConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseAttacker

Rewrite Attacker Implementation for modifying user prompts to bypass restrictions.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the Rewrite Attacker. 用于Rewrite Attacker的配置

attack(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], **kwargs) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Execute an attack by rewriting the latest user prompt.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of messages in the conversation. 对话中的消息列表

  • kwargs – Additional parameters for the attack. 额外的攻击参数

Returns:

Modified list of messages with the rewritten prompt. 包含重写提示的更改消息列表

rewrite(prompt: str) → str[source]

Rewrite the given prompt using the specified template.

Parameters:

prompt – The original user prompt. 原始用户提示

Returns:

The rewritten prompt. 重写后的提示

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.rewrite.RewriteAttackerConfig(attacker_cls: str = 'RewriteAttacker', attacker_name: str | None = None, llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, rewrite_template: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: BaseAttackerConfig

Configuration for the Rewrite Attacker.

Parameters:

  • attacker_cls – Class of the attacker, default is “RewriteAttacker”. 攻击者的类型，默认值为 “RewriteAttacker”

  • attacker_name – Name of the attacker. 攻击者的名称

  • llm_config – Configuration for the language model. LLM配置

  • llm_gen_config – Configuration for generating output with LLM. LLM生成配置

  • rewrite_template – Template for rewriting user prompts. 用于重写用户提示的模板

attacker_cls: str = 'RewriteAttacker'
attacker_name: str = None
llm_config: BaseLLMConfig
llm_gen_config: LLMGenerateConfig = None
rewrite_template: str = None

jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.transfer module

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.transfer.TransferAttacker(config: TransferAttackerConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseAttacker

Transfer Attacker Implementation that substitutes the user message with a pre-formulated attack prompt.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the Transfer Attacker. 用于Transfer Attacker的配置

attack(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], **kwargs) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Execute an attack by transferring a reformulated request into the conversation.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of messages in the conversation. 对话中的消息列表

  • kwargs – Additional parameters for the attack, must include “request_reformulated”. 额外攻击参数，必须包含 “request_reformulated”

Returns:

Modified list of messages with the reformulated request. 包含重新表达请求的更改消息列表

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.transfer.TransferAttackerConfig(attacker_cls: str = 'TransferAttacker', attacker_name: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: BaseAttackerConfig

Configuration for the Transfer Attacker.

Parameters:

  • attacker_cls – Class of the attacker, default is “TransferAttacker”. 攻击者的类型，默认值为 “TransferAttacker”

  • attacker_name – Name of the attacker. 攻击者的名称

attacker_cls: str = 'TransferAttacker'
attacker_name: str = None

class jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.RewriteAttackerConfig(attacker_cls: str = 'RewriteAttacker', attacker_name: str | None = None, llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, rewrite_template: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: BaseAttackerConfig

  • attacker_name – Name of the attacker. 攻击者的名称

  • llm_config – Configuration for the language model. LLM配置

  • llm_gen_config – Configuration for generating output with LLM. LLM生成配置

  • rewrite_template – Template for rewriting user prompts. 用于重写用户提示的模板
